lines.text: First thing we're going to do is open a bank account.
Now, is that different from opening a safe?
We got to put some distance between us and this town or it's going to become our permanent residence, and I mean permanent.
Our picture's never going to get in the history books now.
Oh, yes it will. We'll go down as numbers 16 or 17 shot by Marshall Wooly Bill Hitchcock.
